column4: Can anyone please help me get my sound to work? Everything is detected ( I think ) and unmuted yet I still cant hear anything
well then Fryguy-- I probaly did it
What im trying to say is that ive spent the last 2 days 'googling it' and nothing has worked
then you're in the right place
what are you trying to do?
I am trying to get my onboard sound to work
is your sound card detected under lspci and/or the sound gui under system > preferences > sound?
have you installed the latest alsa driver and libraries?
I am pretty sure but how would I go about checking just to be positive?
did you download alsa and install it yourself?
im pretty sure I did but how would I go about checking
I'm not sure how you would check the version, but you can always reinstall to make sure, you want to reinstall?
if you think it may help then sure
